name: aether-collab-branding-refresh
overview: Sync branding with theme, resolve Firestore permission issues, and enhance collaborative task/project flows.
plan:
# Aether Collaboration & Branding Refresh Plan

1. Logo & Theme Sync
   - Create a reusable `Logo` component that swaps light/dark assets and removes the old "AETHER" wordmark.
   - Update landing, auth/onboarding, sidebar, header/footer, and loading screen to use the new component with a refreshed loading animation.

2. Firestore Access Fixes
   - Restrict automatic metadata migrations to project owners, then backfill missing `ownerId`/`teamMemberIds` safely.
   - Extend `firestore.rules` to cover member reads/writes and allow task/project deletion.
   - Introduce a `userDirectory` collection (populated on signup/seed) plus matching rules/hooks (`useTeamSearch`) for invite lookup without exposing private user docs.

3. Project & Task CRUD Enhancements
   - Add delete flows for projects and tasks, ensuring hooks and UI update Firestore consistently.
   - Improve the member management UI (clear statuses, add/remove interactions) while keeping metadata in sync.
   - Verify assigned-task queries and invites honor the refreshed security model.

4. QA & Documentation
   - Smoke test create/update/delete project, add/remove member, create/assign/delete task, verify assigned tasks and invites in both themes.
   - Update docs (rules/indexes readme) to reflect the new directory and logo handling.
